data.lyric:
[ti:Who Do You Love]
[ar:The Chainsmokers]
[al:Who Do You Love]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Who Do You Love (Explicit) - The Chainsmokers/5 Seconds Of Summer
[00:02.23]Lyrics by：Andrew Taggart/Alex Pall/Talay Riley/Sean Douglas/Luke Hemmings/Calum Hood/Ashton Irwin/Michael Clifford
[00:04.47]Composed by：Andrew Taggart/Alex Pall/Talay Riley/Warren Felder/Sean Douglas/Luke Hemmings/Calum Hood/Ashton Irwin/Michael Clifford/Trevor Brown/Zaire Koalo
[00:06.70]Yeah
[00:08.68]Found cigarettes in your Fendi coat
[00:12.32]Even though you don't even smoke
[00:15.72]Always changin' your access codes
[00:18.89]Yeah I can tell you no one knew
[00:21.90]Yeah you've been actin' so conspicuous
[00:25.34]You flip it on me say I think too much
[00:28.74]You're movin' different when we're makin' love
[00:32.41]Baby tell me tell me
[00:34.66]Who do you love do you love now
[00:38.04]I wanna know the truth whoa
[00:41.53]Who do you love do you love now
[00:44.81]I know it's someone new
[00:47.16]You ain't gotta make it easy where you been sleepin'
[00:51.00]This s**t is keepin' me up at night just admit it
[00:54.85]Who do you love do you love now
[00:58.73]I wanna know I wanna know who
[01:01.79]Now now who do you who do you love love yeah
[01:05.94]Now now who do you who do you love now oh
[01:08.71]Now now who do you who do you you yeah
[01:12.47]I wanna know I wanna know who
[01:17.12]You keep switchin' your alibi
[01:20.54]Stutterin' when you reply
[01:23.98]You can't even look me in the eye
[01:27.40]Ooh I can tell I know you're lyin'
[01:30.49]'Cause you've been actin' so conspicuous
[01:33.91]You flip it on me say I think too much
[01:37.35]You're movin' different when we're makin' love
[01:40.59]So baby tell me tell me
[01:43.28]Who do you love do you love now
[01:46.59]I wanna know the truth whoa
[01:50.05]Who do you love do you love now
[01:53.51]I know it's someone new
[01:55.80]You ain't gotta make it easy where you been sleepin'
[01:59.61]This s**t is keepin' me up at night just admit it
[02:03.36]Who do you love do you love now
[02:07.25]I wanna know I wanna know who
[02:10.72]Now now who do you who do you love love yeah
[02:14.33]Now now who do you who do you love now oh
[02:17.20]Now now who do you who do you you yeah
[02:20.99]I wanna know I wanna know who
[02:24.43]Who you been actin' so conspicuous
[02:27.55]Who you flip it on me say I think too much
[02:31.36]Who movin' different when we makin' love
[02:34.93]Who baby tell me tell me

[02:48.40]I know it's someone new

data.trans:
[ti:Who Do You Love]
[ar:The Chainsmokers]
[al:Who Do You Love]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.23]//
[00:04.46]//
[00:06.70]//
[00:08.68]你的芬迪外套里有烟
[00:12.32]但你根本不抽烟
[00:15.72]你的手机密码一改再改
[00:18.89]这些事情你我都心中有数
[00:21.90]你最近的行为简直就是欲盖弥彰
[00:25.34]你却怪我想太多
[00:28.74]我们亲热时你都心不在焉了
[00:32.41]宝贝 告诉我
[00:34.66]你现在爱上了谁
[00:38.04]我想听真话
[00:41.53]你现在爱上了谁
[00:44.81]我知道你爱上了别人
[00:47.16]别想敷衍了事 昨晚你在哪里睡的
[00:51.00]我已经为此彻夜难眠了 承认吧
[00:54.85]你现在爱上了谁
[00:58.73]我想知道 我想知道
[01:01.79]你现在爱上了谁
[01:05.94]你现在爱上了谁

[01:12.47]我想知道 我想知道
[01:17.12]继续找借口吧

[01:23.98]你都不敢直视我的眼睛
[01:27.40]我看得出来 我知道你在撒谎
